name: Toy Seeker
description: Toy Seeker is an interesting game in which you have to perform tasks for finding different toys.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Storage: 1 GB available space
